applyFee((address,uint32,uint64,uint64,b.details: Included to future proof the API to allow for fees to modify state.In the case of the FeeLibV1 implementation, state is not modified.

applyFeeView((address,uint32,uint64,uint.details: Reverts with Paused if the path is paused.

params._params: The transfer information, namely the amount and destination

returns.amountOutSD: The number of tokens the sender will receive on the destination chain, in shared decimals.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._zone1FeeMillionth: The fee for the first zone in millionth
params._zone1UpperBound: The upper bound for the first zone
params._zone2FeeMillionth: The fee for the second zone in millionth
params._zone2UpperBound: The upper bound for the second zone
params._zone3FeeMillionth: The fee for the third zone in millionth

params._isPaused: A flag indicating whether or not the destination is paused.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

applyFeeView((address,uint32,uint64,uint.notice: Apply fee to the request parameters and calculate the expected output amount on the destination chain

setFeeConfig(uint32,uint64,uint64,uint24.notice: Set the new configuration for a destination.

setPaused(uint32,bool).notice: Pause fee calculation for a destination.

userdoc.notice: An implementation of IStargateFeeLib used to calculate fees for Stargate transfers.
